Title: Willow
Writer: George Lucas (story by), Bob Dolman (screenplay by)
Actors: Val Kilmer, Joanne Whalley, Warwick Davis, Jean Marsh
Plot: A young farmer is chosen to undertake a perilous journey in order to protect a special baby from an evil queen.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 1 win & 9 nominations.
Production: Imagine Entertainment, Lucasfilm Ltd., Metro Goldwyn Mayer
